00052 
00053 class OSIMCOMMON_API Scale : public Object
00054 {

00105     void getScaleFactors(double rScaleFactors[]){   // A variant that uses basic types for use by GUI
00106         getScaleFactors(SimTK::Vec3::updAs(rScaleFactors));
00107     }
00108

00111         setScaleFactors(SimTK::Vec3::getAs(aScaleFactors));
00112     }
